<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// UnknownPadding - Return the worst case padding that could result from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// unknown offset bits.  This does not include alignment padding caused by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// known offset bits.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BasicBlockInfo - Information about the offset and size of a single</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// basic block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a6fec3f0b886c81f10897cccfba57e904">BasicBlockInfo</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Offset - Distance from the beginning of the function to the beginning</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// of this basic block.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Offsets are computed assuming worst case padding before an aligned</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// block. This means that subtracting basic block offsets always gives a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// conservative estimate of the real distance which may be smaller.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Because worst case padding is used, the computed offset of an aligned</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// block may not actually be aligned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#acadf079e9232969cd61ca5744b10dd16"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#acadf079e9232969cd61ca5744b10dd16">Offset</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Size - Size of the basic block in bytes.  If the block contains</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// inline assembly, this is a worst case estimate.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The size does not include any alignment padding whether from the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// beginning of the block, or from an aligned jump table at the end.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a1b26f2a8fbde15592af8af3fb950d8fc"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a1b26f2a8fbde15592af8af3fb950d8fc">Size</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// KnownBits - The number of low bits in Offset that are known to be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// exact.  The remaining bits of Offset are an upper bound.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a57a9e20cafe54e922aeead667cdd73ff"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a57a9e20cafe54e922aeead667cdd73ff">KnownBits</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Unalign - When non-zero, the block contains instructions (inline asm)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// of unknown size.  The real size may be smaller than Size bytes by a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// multiple of 1 &lt;&lt; Unalign.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#aadef2620c9e7d116fda27a2d9edbd125"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#aadef2620c9e7d116fda27a2d9edbd125">Unalign</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// PostAlign - When &gt; 1, the block terminator contains a .align</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// directive, so the end of the block is aligned to PostAlign bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a3322f1dcf981856028e4ec195de0024d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a3322f1dcf981856028e4ec195de0024d">PostAlign</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a6fec3f0b886c81f10897cccfba57e904"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a6fec3f0b886c81f10897cccfba57e904">BasicBlockInfo</a>() = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the number of known offset bits internally to this block.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This number should be used to predict worst case padding when</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// splitting the block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a5f264104cc3a87ed07dd196d281ccd2c"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a5f264104cc3a87ed07dd196d281ccd2c">internalKnownBits</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Bits = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#aadef2620c9e7d116fda27a2d9edbd125">Unalign</a> ? <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#aadef2620c9e7d116fda27a2d9edbd125">Unalign</a> : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a57a9e20cafe54e922aeead667cdd73ff">KnownBits</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the block size isn&#39;t a multiple of the known bits, assume the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// worst case padding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the offset immediately following this block.  If Align is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// specified, return the offset the successor block will get if it has</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// this alignment.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a96d35759d0115509c273fbdfd8fe011a"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a96d35759d0115509c273fbdfd8fe011a">postOffset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1))</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PO = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#acadf079e9232969cd61ca5744b10dd16">Offset</a> + <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a1b26f2a8fbde15592af8af3fb950d8fc">Size</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> PA = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a3322f1dcf981856028e4ec195de0024d">PostAlign</a>, Alignment);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PA == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add alignment padding from the terminator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the number of known low bits of postOffset.  If this block</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// contains inline asm, the number of known bits drops to the</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// of know bits.</Highlight></CodeLine>
